short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: La-Z-Tab is a Replacement Page for Chrome New Tab. It enables faster browsing and increases prodcuctvity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
La-Z-Tab is a replacement to google's New tab page in chrome. It has a 250 motivational quotes in current version n changes randomly on every refresh. It has SHORTLINKS of favourite website as a addition to your bookmark bar. At last it also display today's date and current timing.
La-Z-tab is customisable and has 10 different background color and 20 website links to choose from.
